original_text: People who rob other people. People who want many things for themselves. Drunks. People who insult other people. People who deceive other people to take things from them. None of these people will receive the good things of God's kingdom.
korean_text: 도적이나 탐욕을 부리는 자나 술 취하는 자나 모욕하는 자나 속여 빼앗는 자들은 하나님의 나라를 유업으로 받지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: People who want many things for themselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 자신을 위해 많은 것들을 원하는 사람들.

sentences.original_text: People who deceive other people to take things from them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게서 물건을 빼앗기 위해 다른 사람들을 속이는 사람들.

sentences.original_text: None of these people will receive the good things of God's kingdom.
sentences.korean_translation: 이들 중 어떤 사람도 하나님 나라의 좋은 것들을 받지 못할 것이다.
